data.title: Heart of Darkness
data.meta_description: Heart of Darkness Online :: Heart of Darkness is a 2D cinematic platformer, developed by Amazing Studio and game designer Eric Chahi. The game places players in the role of a child named Andy as he attempts to rescue his dog Whiskey, that has been kidnapped by dark creatures during the eclipse. The game has about half an hour of storytelling cinematic sequences, thousands of 2D animated frames, and uses pre-rendered background scenery. The game is known for the number of disturbing ways the protagonist can be killed...

platform, sci-fi

platform

PlayStation, PC Windows

Heart of Darkness is a 2D cinematic platformer, developed by Amazing Studio and game designer Eric Chahi. The game places players in the role of a child named Andy as he attempts to rescue his dog Whiskey, that has been kidnapped by dark creatures during the eclipse. The game has about half an hour of storytelling cinematic sequences, thousands of 2D animated frames, and uses pre-rendered background scenery. The game is known for the number of disturbing ways the protagonist can be killed...
